dmca.title: [EV1-C2538509A] copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 9:08:07 a.m.
(GMT-6) on January 15, 2007.

Legal Response Team
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2007 3:20 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C2538509A] copyright infringement

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

From: Nicole <nsavage@sfheart.com>

Subject: copyright infringement
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Antivirus: avast! (VPS 0702-1, 01/11/2007), Outbound message
X-Antivirus-Status: Clean
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of
TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
Return-Path: nsavage@sfheart.com
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Jan 2007 15:15:26.0860 (UTC)
FILETIME=[7D30F4C0:01C7365C] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Attention:www.ev1servers.net 
 
My website is http://www.sfheart.com and on my web site I have a page
URL: http://www.sfheart.com/naked_for_peace.html 
 
The location of the material that is infringing on my copyright is
URL: www.biolife.ws
If you will be so kind as to view both my website and  you will
immediately see the difference from my original work and what biolife.ws
has done to it. 
 
My web site is dedicated to my city, San Francisco and the promotion and
practice of Peace and love. I created the page Naked For Peace to
document and share information and various examples of people who chose
to demonstrate for peace in an unusual way. Many people in the world
participated in these unusual actions to garner media attention for
their cause which is Peace. 
Some of the images on the page are my own and some belong to others who
have  given me permission to share their images. 
My page also has some newspaper images with links back to the original
newspaper articles that first reported the stories about these peace
actions. 
 
The web page does contain my original text  and also has links to other
pages within my sfheart.com website. 
 
Although some of the images may be considered provocative to some, none
of the images are of a high enough resolution to clearly identify the
people who participated in the pictures.  
And none of the the page or the links  I provide on the page go to any
website that would be considered as pornographic. 
My website in its entirety is concerned to be family safe. 
 
The owner of  biolife.ws has copied images off my  
site, changed the file names and saved them to their server.   
They have copied the content of  my entire page, changed some of the
text and added links to pornographic websites. 
Most of the links to other pages on my sfheart.com web site are intact
which could lead people to think that biolife.ws is in some way
connected to my sfheart.com To make matters even worse, their illegal
work is listed on several search engines. 
I happened to find found out about this infringement through my stats
administration page which showed biolife.ws <www.biolife.ws/>  as one of
the URLs that visited mine. 
 
 
It is difficult for me to identify the person who owns biolife
<www.biolife.ws/>.ws and contact them myself because they have no
reachable email contact. 
I am writing to you to ask you to remove www.biolife.ws/ from your
server immediately. 
A reply concerning this matter would be appreciated. 
 
I hereby state under penalty of perjury, that the above information is
accurate and I am the authorized owner of the copyright and intellectual
property in question. 
 
My name is Nicole Savage
address: 6340 Geary Blvd
San Francisco, Ca.94121
phone: (415) 386-4046
email: nsavage@sfheart.com 
 
/Nicole Savage/
Nicole Savage
